82bc23f45d7d57dfa26d1a1d4ec0f7dfcd88abb2.commitMessage: Pull #4328: moved variables inside if blocks to reduce execution time

4d2e6647f9e8385749c382bcab5e64965a943178.commitMessage:
Rename boolean methods to start with question word. #1555

Fixes `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

4c078ba710068498ca513ce115993e30dab4562a.commitMessage:
Make "private" methods "static" where possible. #46

SonarQube rule: ["private" methods that don't access instance data should be "static"](http://nemo.sonarqube.org/coding_rules#rule_key=squid%3AS2325).

Rationale: private methods that don't access instance data can be static to prevent any misunderstanding about the contract of the method.

0a72322796c28266f07df8af6f7e000aa9cf0e48.commitMessage: Tighten up the allowed use of the {@inheritDoc} tag.
